content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "green_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "netherite_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "zombie_villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_sign", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 36}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 35, "index": 40}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 51, "index": 41}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 59, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft gray_terracotta, I need to place 1 terracotta and 1 gray_dye side by side in the crafting table. Therefore I will move the terracotta from slot 36 to slot 1 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
